portfolio.title: NC News
portfolio.description: My first solo project completed on the Northcoders bootcamp. The stack used includes JS, Express, pSQL and React.

portfolio.title: Questr
portfolio.description: My final group project completed on the Northcoders bootcamp. The stack used includes Typescript, React Native Expo, AWS S3 and Dynamo DB and Express.

portfolio.title: On This Day
portfolio.description: A personal project using JavaScript, Firebase and Cloud Functions to get historic news from the current date.
